related_post.text: anybody have any experience interfacing with macOS clipboard? I have been falling in love with go but only used it in practice to make a few xml scrapers at work. I had an idea to make a simple clipboard history CLI tool with go and sqlite and read/write looks easy but I have no idea how to watch for changes to the clipboard without polling. (i'm a juniorjunior web dev so don't have much exp with things like this so if this is a stupid question forgive me)

comments: Rudesino asks quesstion and Shritha provides answer
